name: ESPN X-Games Pro Boarder
overview: A snowboarding game published by Electronic Arts and developed by Radical Entertainment, wherein several game modes were supported, including downhill and half-pipe. Snowboard as some of the world's best riders while you shred through nine intense levels! Full Freedom 3D lets you ride the whole mountain while you listen to the slammin' soundtrack featuring artists like Foo Fighters, Rancid, NOFX, and more!
